member.name: T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment
member.summary: Provides information about the current hosting environment in which services are running.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.AspNetCompatibilityEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this service is running in the context of the ASP.NET HTTP application pipeline.
member.returns: true if ASP.NET compatibility is enabled for the current AppDomain; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.EnsureServiceAvailable(System.String)
member.summary: Ensures that a service is activated at the provided virtual path.
member.param: The virtual path to the service.
member.exception: A service at given virtual path cannot be found.
The service fails to activate successfully.
The service is not running in the hosted environment.
is an absolute URI or not valid.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostingEnvironment.MultipleSiteBindingsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether multiple site bindings are allows for the service host.
member.returns: true if multiple site bindings are enables, otherwise false.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceBuildProvider.CodeCompilerType
member.summary: Represents the compiler type used by a build provider to generate source code for a custom file type.
member.returns: A read-only compiler type that represents the code generator, code compiler, and compiler settings used to build source code for the virtual path.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceBuildProvider.GenerateCode(System.Web.Compilation.AssemblyBuilder)
member.summary: Generates source code for the virtual path of the build provider, and adds the source code to a specified assembly builder.

member.summary: Generates a string to be persisted in the compiled assembly.
member.returns: A string to be persisted in the build environment.
member.param: The compilation results for the build provider's virtual path.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceBuildProvider.GetResultFlags(System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates actions required when a virtual path is built.
member.returns: The actions required after the virtual path is built within the ASP.NET build environment.
member.param: The compilation results for the build provider's virtual path.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceBuildProvider.VirtualPathDependencies
member.summary: Represents a collection of virtual paths that must be built before the build provider generates code.
member.returns: The virtual paths that this instance of the build provider is dependent on.
